title: 'assertion failed: !span.inner().is_dummy()',

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Found in [Rollup CI](https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/runs/7806183078?check_suite_focus=true) of [Rollup](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/100449#issuecomment-1213091420) ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: !span.inner().is_dummy()', src/librustdoc/html/render/context.rs:308:9 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: !span.inner().is_dummy()', src/librustdoc/html/render/context.rs:308:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f21fb0dab1e - ::fmt::h45188f431115ce78 1: 0x7f21fb13f539 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h17e348f497692bdf 11: 0x7f21fb093fed - core::panicking::panic::hd45a1628a1e55d64 12: 0x563c36d13401 - ::href_from_span 13: 0x563c36cab860 - rustdoc[680b4809a76ead34]::html::render::print_item::print_item 14: 0x563c36d1195d - ::render_item 15: 0x563c36d18174 - ::mod_item_in 16: 0x563c36d0f552 - rustdoc[680b4809a76ead34]::formats::renderer::run_format:: 17: 0x563c36b247d2 - rustdoc[680b4809a76ead34]::run_renderer:: 18: 0x563c36d57708 - ::time::, rustdoc[680b4809a76ead34]::main_options::{closure#0}::{closure#0}::{closure#1}::{closure#1}> 19: 0x563c36c31929 - ::enter::> 20: 0x563c36b27820 - ::enter::> 21: 0x563c36e2ce00 - rustc_span[45192a7c83250c40]::with_source_map::, rustc_interface[61b2afca71575b98]::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustdoc[680b4809a76ead34]::main_options::{closure#0}>::{closure#1}> 22: 0x563c36b29ec7 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::he40f12d1049c6b05 28: 0x7f21fae106ba - start_thread 29: 0x7f21fa62751d - clone 30: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.65.0-nightly (6d60e5b24 2022-08-12) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not document `foo` ```
